_comment: Shared journey templates for MindVibe. Used by both backend and frontend for fallback when database is not seeded.
_source: Single source of truth for demo/fallback journey templates

templates.title: Transform Anger (Krodha)
templates.description: A 14-day journey to transform destructive anger into constructive energy through Gita wisdom. Learn to recognize triggers, practice patience, and cultivate inner peace.

templates.title: Mastering Desire (Kama)
templates.description: A 21-day journey to understand and master desires. Transform cravings into purposeful aspirations aligned with your dharma.

templates.title: Contentment Over Greed (Lobha)
templates.description: A 14-day journey to cultivate santosha (contentment) and release the grip of greed. Find abundance in simplicity.

templates.title: Clarity Over Attachment (Moha)
templates.description: A 21-day journey to see through delusion and attachment. Develop viveka (discrimination) and find clarity.

templates.title: Humility Over Ego (Mada)
templates.description: A 14-day journey to dissolve ego and cultivate true humility. Recognize the Self beyond the small self.

templates.title: Joy Over Envy (Matsarya)
templates.description: A 14-day journey to transform envy into mudita (sympathetic joy). Celebrate others' success as your own.

templates.title: Complete Inner Transformation
templates.description: A comprehensive 30-day journey addressing all six inner enemies. The ultimate path to self-mastery and liberation.
